title: Pet friendly Apartment with a Modern Finish! Close to the Green Line
map_address: Chestnut Hill Ave near Commonwealth Ave
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 160361283', 'Rent: $2,650 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', '- 9/1/22 move in.', '- Heat and hot water included.', '- Laundry in building.', '- Stainless steel appliances.', '- Hardwood flooring.', '- Close to the green line and Cleveland Circle.', 'Call now!', 'Tram: B Chestnut Hill Avenue (0.05 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Commonwealth Ave (0.03 mi)', 'Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Reservoir (0.33 mi)', 'Tram: C Cleveland Circle (0.29 mi)', 'Tram: D Reservoir (0.35 mi)', 'Bus: 51 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Buckminster Rd (0.56 mi)', 'Bus: 65 Washington St @ Euston St (0.61 mi)', 'Val Temin', '6177845998', 'If you would like to take a look at additional apartment options please see below:', 'https://ygl.is/valvel-temin', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
